newsArray.title: 'We were terrible and still won': Cummins fires World Cup warning
newsArray.description: Australian captain Pat Cummins will miss the T20 World Cup. He is recovering from a back stress fracture. Cummins believes Australia can still win the tournament. He highlighted the team's depth and experience. Many players have performed well in the Big Bash League. Cummins also prioritizes Test cricket for his long-term career.
creator: toi sports desk

newsArray.title: Nine world cups later, the host still waits: The strange T20 World Cup curse
newsArray.description: The ICC Men's T20 World Cup has become a global spectacle since 2007. Six nations have won the title. India recently secured their second T20 World Cup in 2024. The tournament has a history of dramatic finishes and unexpected outcomes. Hosts have never won the trophy. India and Sri Lanka will co-host the next edition.
keywords: icc men’s t20 world cup,t20 world cup host curse,t20 cricket,india t20 world cup victory,2024 t20 world cup
creator: et online
